name: Weekly Agenda - GTD
description: Easily organize your goals into manageable tasks you can schedule throughout the weekStay on task by planning out the week ahead in alignment with your monthly, quarterly, and long-term goals!This Notion Weekly Agenda Template features:Quarterly and monthly goal trackingProject planningTask progress stats7+ views for action itemsTo-do & due by date propertiesQuick menu navHourly agenda by weekdayMinimalist clock widgetPlusA beginner's guide to help learn this templateQuestions or comments?Ge
features: Quarterly and monthly goal tracking; Project planning; Task progress stats; 7+ views for action items; To-do & due by date properties; Quick menu nav; Hourly agenda by weekday; Minimalist clock widget
